# schema-validator

> Production-grade OSSA manifest validator with comprehensive error reporting

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.1
- **Category**: validators
- **Manifest**: schema-validator.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Validate OSSA agent manifests against the official JSON Schema.
Provide detailed error reports, suggestions, and auto-fix capabilities.

capabilities:
- manifest-validation

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./schema-validator.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
